Many children wait impatiently for the sound of the bell at the end of the school day to meet at Veronica's sweet stand, who attends to the children kindly. Veronica has done this work for a long time. After serving her clients at this space, she moves to a kiosk that she has in a park, where she also offers a variety of products for children. She does all of this work for her two small children, who are one and four years old. She hopes to be able to come up with enough money to be able to purchase a lot to expand her small house. She hopes to invest in her sweets business, so that she can start to increase her income with the purpose of building her dreams. With your help, she will be able to accomplish the goal that she has decided on.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

Muchos niños esperan impacientemente el sonido de la campana de salida del colegio y presurosos se reúnen en el puesto de dulces de la señora Verónica, quién gentilmente los atiende desde hace ya mucho tiempo.Luego de cumplir con sus clientes en ese espacio, se dirige al kiosco que posee en un parque donde también expende diversidad de productos para niños. Todo este enorme trabajo lo realiza por sus dos pequeños hijos de 1 y 4 años, ya que tiene la esperanza de poder juntar el dinero suficiente para poder comprarse un lote para ampliar su pequeña casa.Ella desea invertir en su negocio de dulces, para que de esta manera pueda empezar a incrementar sus ingresos con la finalidad de estructurar sus sueños.Con vuestra ayuda podrá conseguir la meta que se ha planteado.

loans.use: Increase of capital to buy more sweets.

loans.name: Carmen Lourdes

texts.es:
From the time she was very young Carmen dreamed of cultivating the land of her mother, a dream she has realized. Thanks to these efforts, she is able to grow potatoes and gladiolas which she sells, while still taking care of her home. Recently, her husband was sent on a new project in the city of Casapalca and she has been left in charge of the family. This is very difficult for her with her husband gone. However, Carmen hopes to increase her income from her harvests with a greater quantity of bulbs and fertilizers which will help her grow better products. Help us support this woman as she works so hard. With your help she can reach her goals.

Carmen, desde muy niña soñó con trabajar sembrando en las tierras de su madre, sueño que ahora se consolidó y que gracias al esfuerzo de su madre puede disfrutar de los frutos de sus cosechas de papas y gladiolos, como también disfruta criando a sus cuyes, sin descuidar la atención a su hogar.Ella hasta ahora pudo hacer crecer sus cosechas, pero ahora se suscitó un nuevo proyecto de trabajo para su pareja en la cuidad de Casapalca y ahora ella quedó al cuidado integro de su familia, tarea muy difícil de realizar por el alejamiento de su esposo.Sin embargo, Carmen, tiene la esperanza de obtener mayores ingresos en sus cosechas con mayor cantidad de abonos y fertilizantes que le ayudará a tener mejores productos.Apoyemos a una mujer que lucha para seguir sembrando sus productos, con vuestra contribución lo logrará.

loans.use: TO PURCHASE BULBS AND FERTILIZERS TO INCREASE HER HARVESTS.  SHE NEEDS TO INCREASE HER INCOME TO BETTER SUPPORT HER FAMILY.

loans.name: Florisa

texts.es:
Florisa works tirelessly selling meals in her neighborhood. For more than 16 years, she has been working to improve her economic situation and cover the costs of her children, who thanks to her efforts have been able to pursue their own professions. Florisa prepares every delicious dish she offers in her home, taking advantage of the events in the neighborhood to increase her sales. Even in the face of tragedy, with the death of her husband, she continued to move forward, motivated by her children. Today, many people enjoy her meals and her culinary skills, but she still needs support to continue helping her children with the care of her grandchildren. Florisa has a great desire to useful, and wants to continue with her business. She would like to set up a small restaurant in her house where she can serve her dishes, continue to earn an income and help her family. Let's help this grandmother in her efforts to improve the quality of life for her children and grandchildren.

La señora Florisa, trabaja incansablemente vendiendo comida en su localidad dentro D. su recinto, ofrece diariamente riquísimos platillos y hace más D. 16 años es una actividad que le ha ayudado a crecer económicamente y a solventar los gastos D. sus hijos, quienes gracias el esfuerzo D. su adorada madre se han convertido en profesionales. Cada plato que ofrece los prepara en su hogar y aprovecha los eventos para incrementar sus ventas.A pesar D. esta dura situación por la que atravesó luego D. la muerte D. su esposo, ha podido salir adelante, motivada por el amor D. madre.Ahora muchas personas disfrutan D. su excelente sazón y gran versatilidad D. platos, gracias a sus habilidades culinarias, sin embargo hoy requiere D. apoyo para poder seguir ayudando a sus hijos en el cuidado D. sus nietos y por ello tiene unas inmensas ganas D. ser útil y seguir trabajando con la venta D. sus deliciosos platos. Por lo que anhela ambientar su local y así hacer más acogedor su restaurante para vender sus riquísimos platillos, D. tal manera que pueda seguir siendo aquél apoyo incondicional para sus hijos y nietos.Colaboremos para que esta cariñosa abuelita pueda seguir contribuyendo con el incremento del nivel D. vida D. su familia.

loans.use: TO SET UP A SMALL RESTAURANT IN HER HOUSE AND SERVE HER CUSTOMERS, INSTEAD OF SELLING MEALS AROUND THE NEIGHBORHOOD.  WITH HER INCOME, THIS WIDOW AND GRANDMOTHER  HELPS SUPPORT HER CHILDREN AND GRANDCHILDREN.

loans.name: Teodolinda Luz

texts.es:
Teodolinda Luz works with great fortitude undertaking agricultural labours and caring for livestock. She and her husband have, through their efforts, managed to obtain a small house for the well-being of their 15 year-old son, who has hopes and enthusiasm for continuing his studies in order to realise his ambitions. This is the dynamo which pushes them to continue working and they are completely dedicated to continuing to extract profit from their breeding and care of cows and bulls, without neglecting the affections that the they offer their son.

Despite the production of their lands, they are unable to meet all the expenses of their home and for this reason they have thought of opening a shop and a small restaurant in their locality in order to save enough money to ensure that their son can continue with higher studies. Work with us in order that this family can reach their objectives.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Teodolinda Luz trabaja con entereza en las labores agrícolas y en la crianza de animals. Ella y su esposo han logrado obtener con su esfuerzo una casita para el bienestar de su hijo de 15 años, el cual tiene ilusiones y entusiasmo de estudiar para lograr sus metas.Es este el motor que los impulsa a seguir trabajando y dedicarse enteramente a seguir echándole ganas a la crianza de sus vacas y toros, sin descuidar el lado afectivo que le brindan a su hijo.

A pesar de tener la producción de sus terrenos ellos no pueden satisfacer todos los gastos de su hogar y es por ello que han pensado abrir una tienda y un pequeño restaurante en su localidad para ahorrar lo suficiente para hacer realidad los estudios superiores de su hijo.Colaboremos para que esta familia pueda alcanzar sus objetivos.

loans.use: Opening of a small shop and restaurant in the exisitng buildings

loans.name: Sofía Irene

texts.es:
Irene is a woman who up until now has fought eagerly to obtain potatoes and vegetables from her fertile lands, in order to later sell them commercially in the town of Chanchamayo. With this activity, together with her husband she has been able to educate her nine children and give them the best attentions. Faced with the responsibility of her numerous family, she had to rent more land to cultivate in order to meet their expenses.

Today they need to improve the consumable products which their harvests generate, which they hope to sell commercially in the capital with the aim of obtaining better profits in order to educate their children who long to continue their higher education outsiD. the town of their birth. We hope that you can help this family who need $200 dollars in order to buy the fertilizer and manure which they lack in order to improve their products for a quick harvest. Your help will proviD. them with happiness and well-being.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Irene, es una dama que hasta ahora ha luchado con ahínco para obtener D. sus fértiles tierras papa y verduras; para después comercializarlos en la ciudad D. Chanchamayo. Con esta actividad que desempeña junto a su esposo ha podido educar a sus 9 hijos y darle las mejores atenciones. Frente a la responsabilidad D. su numerosa familia tuvo que arrendar un terreno más D. cultivo para solventar los gastos D. su familia.

Hoy requieren mejorar los productos D. consumo que generan sus cosechas, lo cual espera comercializarlos en la capital a fin D. obtener mayores ganancias para educar a sus hijos que anhelan realizar estudios superiores fuera D. su ciudad natal. Esperamos que usted pueda ayudar a esta familia que requiere D. 200 dólares para comprar los abonos y fertilizantes que hacen falta para el mejoramiento D. sus productos para su pronta cosecha.Vuestro apoyo les brindará felicidad y bienestar.

loans.use: Pruchase fertilizer and manure

loans.name: Lucy Marlene

texts.es:
Lucy has been able to dedicate herself to agriculture with much enthusiasm, thanks to the help of her mother, who from when she was small taught her the occupational hazards and how to sell products commercially, motivated by which she offers her products in the town of Chancamayo with thoughts of now transporting them to Lima. With this aim she leaves her mother caring for the products and her lands, who very obligingly agreed to assume the care while her daughter sought buyers.

Despite having the help of her mother, Lucy saw the need to widen their zone of production and buy further land to cultivate, but she also couldn’t give her mother so much responsibility. In consequence of this situation, she has thought of improving her products in order to acquire a further field which she would be able to personally cultivate when the business is consolidated. With your collaboration Lucy will be able to continue living as she is today, very happily and with much hope of forging a promising future.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Lucy a podido dedicarse a la agricultura con mucho esfuerzo gracias al apoyo de su madre que desde pequeña le enseñó los gajes del oficio y de cómo comercializarlos, motivo por el cual ella oferta sus productos en la ciudad de Chanchamayo con miras ahora de transportarlos a la ciudad de Lima. Con este fin deja a su madre al cuidado de sus productos y de sus terrenos, quién muy complacientemente accedió a asumir el cuidado, mientras que ella busca compradores.

A pesar de tener un apoyo en su madre, ella vió la necesidad de ampliar la zona de producción y comprarse un terreno de cultivo más, pero tampoco puede cargar de mucha responsabilidad a su madre. Ha consecuencia de esta situación tiene pensado mejorar sus productos para adquirir un terreno más a fin de encargarse personalmente del cuidado cuando este negocio se consolide.Con tu colaboración Lucy podrá seguir viviendo como hasta hoy, muy contenta y con muchas esperanzas de forjarse un futuro prometedor.

loans.use: Pruchase of another area of land with the aim of consolidating business

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia needed her own income in order to pay for the studies and expenses of her house, as she didn’t have work and the father of her children had abandoned them without giving any explanation. However, thanks to the strength her children give her, she started a business and two years ago she began to sell exercise books and pens in the entrance of a primary school and found someone who lent her money in order to establish her business. But this didn’t work out well, as the person who lent the money charged very high interest rates, and all that she earned selling products she had to repay to this person.

As a result, Claudia is asking for a credit of US $925 to be repaid in a six month period. This money will be used to expand the business and stock merchandise which you already find near a primary school and people are beginning to arrive to buy things. With your help Claudia will be able to provide the basic necessities of life to her sons, so they can survive without the need of their irresponsible father.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Claudia necesitaba de un ingreso propio para poder costear los estudios y los gastos de la casa ya que no tenia trabajo y el papa de sus hijos los abandonó sin dar una explicación. Sin embargo la fuerza que le dan sus hijos, la hizo comenzar un negocio y fue hace 2 años que empezó vendiendo sólo cuadernos y lápices en la entrada de una primaria y consiguió quién le prestara para poner su negocio pero no le fue bien con la persona que le prestó porque le cobraba intereses muy altos, y lo que ganaba vendiendo sus productos se le iban en pagarle a la persona.

Por eso Claudia está solicitando un crédito de US $925 para pagarlos en un plazo de 6 meses y este dinero le servirá para ampliar su negocio y surtir de mercancía ya que se encuentra cerca de una primaria y la gente comienza a llegar para comprarle cosas, Con tu ayuda Claudia podrá brindarles una vida con lo elemental para sobrevivir a sus hijos sin la necesidad de su padre irresponsible.

loans.use: Expand business and merchandise stock.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia is a woman who is always in a good mood to work. She sows and harvests potatoes, corn and also she breeds guinea pigs. She dedicates more time to the latter activity as a consequence of a fall that brought her some complications to her health that prevents her from doing heavy work. Celia has five children who are her adoration; nevertheless the big sums of money that she invests in the higher education of her elder children, has caused a high deficit in order to cover the needs of the rest of her family. That's why she is requesting a loan that will help her improve her crops and increase the harvest of corn in order to obtain a bigger income for the sake of her children. You can help this family to keep living so happy and united like until now.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Celia, es una mujer que trabaja muy alegremente; se dedica a sembrar y cosechar papa, maíz y a la crianza de cuyes. Le dedica el mayor tiempo posible a esta última actividad a consecuencia de una caída que le trajo algunas complicaciones a su actual estado de salud que la imposibilita a realizar trabajos muy fuertes. Celia tiene cinco hijos los cuales son su adoración; sin embargo las costosas sumas de dinero que invierte en la educación superior de sus hijos mayores, le ha ocasionado un alto déficit para la plena satisfacción de las necesidades del resto de su familia. Es por eso que solicita un préstamo que le ayude a mejorar sus cosechas e incrementar sus siembras de maíz para obtener mayores ingresos en beneficio de sus hijos. Tú puedes hacer que esta familia siga viviendo tan feliz y unida como hasta ahora.

loans.use: Increase amount of products and crops.

loans.name: Eliovina

texts.es:
Sra. Eliovina belongs to the Santa Rosa D. Lima community bank in the Peruvian region or "departamento" of Ucayali. She is 40 years old. She started her business 7 years ago, selling beauty products from a small counter. Thanks to loans from Manuela Ramos, she's been able to add other products to her inventory and increase her sales.

With a recently-granted loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.2,000 (2,000 Peruvian soles or about US$666), to be repaid in 4 installments, Eliovina will buy a variety of products: clothing, cosmetics, knitwear, etc.

Eliovina is thrilled and thanks God for the wisdom that He gave her to be able to manage the loans granted by the institution.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Eliovina pertenece al Banco Comunal “Santa Rosa D. Lima” del Distrito D. Yarinacocha del Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 40 años. Inició su negocio hace 7 años vendiendo productos D. belleza en una pequeña vitrina, gracias a los prestamos D. Manuela Ramos ha podido incrementar su negocio en la venta D. ropas.

Con el último préstamo recibido D. Manuela Ramos D. S/.2,000.00 ($666.00) el cual será pagado en 4 cuotas, comprará variedades D. productos como prendas D. vestir, cosméticos, pasamanería, etc.

Eliovina se siente muy bien y da gracias a Dios por la sabiduría que le dió para poder administrar los créditos que le brinda la institución.

loans.use: Buy clothing, cosmetics and knitwear for resale.

loans.name: Liduvina

texts.es:
Liduvina is a very hard-working woman and she owes it to her dear parents who forged in her an attitude of determination and dedication for self-improvement. She has been working in agriculture for the past 25 years and now that she has her own house has made her devote herself to this activity with even more energy. Along with her husband, they are sowing potatoes, corn, wheat, and broad beans. Thanks to this activity she has supported her 6 dear children who are the engine that motivate her to work harder every day. Liduvina wants to establish a business of selling grains, that she will take to the city of Huancayo and she will commercialize them in order to be able to support herself; since in the previous years she has had big losses due to a terrible cold weather. Nevertheless, she hasn’t lost the optimism and the force that keeps her going on, for this reason she is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming fields and with the profits she will implement her business of selling of grains. Let’s support this woman who has a lot of courage and strength to live.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Liduvina, es una mujer muy trabajadora y le debe esta formación de sus queridos padres que forjaron en ella una actitud de empeño y dedicación para su propia superación. Ahora ya lleva 25 años dedicándose a la agricultura y la conformación de su reciente hogar hizo que ella se dedique a esta actividad con mayor ímpetu; En compañía de su esposo siembra papa, maíz, trigo, y habas. Gracias a esta actividad ha mantenido a sus 6 queridos hijos que son el motor que la impulsa cada día a trabajar mas duro. Desea establecer un negocio de venta de granos para llevarlas a la ciudad de Huancayo y comercializarlas a fin de sostenerse económicamente; ya que en años anteriores surgieron pérdidas a causa del terrible frío que azotó sus campos ocasionándole pérdidas cuantiosas. Aun así no pierde el optimismo y la fuerza que la anima a seguir adelante y es por ello que solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de semillas y abono para sus campos de cultivo y con las ganancias que obtenga implementará su negocio de venta de granos. Solidaricémonos con una mujer con mucho coraje y fortaleza para vivir.

loans.use: Compra de abonos y semillas para optimizar la calidad de sus productos.

loans.name: Mauricia Pilar

texts.es:
Pilar is a youngster who from a very young age has been tied to the breeding of animals. She comes from a cattle farmer family that has transmitted her all its knowledge about the breeding of animals. Today, she works in this activity thanks to the support of her parents and her desire to prosper that motivate her to keep going continuously. She wants to support her home, since her parents are seniors and she is the youngest one and still living with them. Pilar's desire is to be able to support them constantly and also to prosper and gain access to a higher education that will allow her acquire bigger knowledge. That's why she has to organize her time well every day to devote herself to the breeding of cows and then sell them to the best bidder. Pilar is requesting a loan to keep on working that she will invest in the purchase of forage for her animals and to pay her studies. Let's support Pilar, so she can continue with her project of life.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Pilar, es una jovencita que desde muy niña ha estado ligada a la crianza de animales, proviene de una familia ganadera que ha transmitido en ella todos sus conocimientos acerca de la crianza de animales y hoy se dedica a esta actividad gracias al apoyo que tiene de sus padres y su afán de superación que la motivan a seguir adelante continuamente y apoyar la economía de su hogar ya que sus queridos progenitores son ya de avanzada edad y ella es la última. El deseo de Pilar es poder apoyarlos constantemente y también superarse y acceder a una educación superior que le permita adqurir mayores conocimientos. Es por eso que cada día tiene que organizar bien su tiempo para dedicarse a la crianza de vacas para luego venderlos al mejor postor. Para seguir trabajando, Pilar, solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de forraje para sus animales y pagar los estudios de su academia. Apoyemos a Pilar a continuar con su proyecto de vida.

loans.use: Buy forage for her animals.

loans.name: Carmen Luisa

texts.es:
Carmen is an enterprising woman. She is always happy to do a good work. When she was young, she had a big desire of self-improvement, so she decided to study Pedagogy and today she is a teacher in a small school in her hometown Chambara. She is also in the sheep breeding business. Both activities allow her to support her 2 children who are the reason of her being; and she has raised them alone since she separated from her husband several years ago. At present the oldest of her children is studying in a Higher Institute and the youngest is in school. Carmen lives with them and her senior mother, for this reason she wants to increase her investment capital to be able to keep supporting them. With your support she will be able to buy new animals. Let's support this mother and professional.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Carmen, es una mujer emprendedora, cada día esta siempre animosa de realizar una buena labor, ella en su juventud y con sus amplios deseos de superación decidió estudiar la carrera de pedagogía y hoy es docente de una escuelita en su tierra natal de Chambara. También se dedica en parte de sus días a la crianza de animales ovejitas, ambas actividades le permiten sostener a sus 2 hijos que son la razón de su existencia y los ha criado ella sola desde que se separó de su esposo ya hace varios años. En la actualidad el mayor de sus hijos esta estudiando en un instituto superior y el menor esta estudiando en la escuela, Carmen vive en compañía de ellos y de su anciana madre y es por ello que anhela incrementar su capital de inversión para seguir procurándoles bienestar y sostén con la nueva adquisición de animalitos que desea realizar con vuestro apoyo. Apoyemos a esta madre y profesional de corazón.

loans.use: Increase working capital to buy more animals.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Sra. Judith belongs to the "Las Flores" (The Flowers) community bank in the Peruvian region or "departamento" of Ucayali. She is 39 years old; her husband and children help her operate the business that she started 5 years ago. She began by raising 200 chickens and she now has 1,400. Judith and each member of her family rise very early to do the chores that have to be done to run the business.

With a recently-granted loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.1,200 (1,200 Peruvian soles or about US$400), to be repaid in 4 months, Judith will buy 4 tons of corn and soya to make chicken feed.

Judith is very happy with her business because the earnings from it allow her to send her children to school and to have a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Judith pertenece al Banco Comunal “Las Flores” del Distrito de Yarinacocha del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 39 años y cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y también de sus hijos en el negocio que realiza desde hace 5 años. Comenzaron con la crianza de 200 pollitos, actualmente tiene 1,400 pollos en crianza. Judith y cada uno de los integrantes de su familia se levantan muy temprano para cumplir con las tareas que cada uno tiene en el negocio.

Con el reciente préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/.1,200.00 (US$ 400.00 aprox.), el cual será pagado en 4 meses, podrá comprar 4 toneladas de maíz y soya para la preparación de los alimentos para los pollos.

Judith, está muy contenta con el negocio emprendido ya que con las ganancias obtenidas le es posible educar a sus hijos y tener una mejor calidad de vida.

loans.use: Buy feed for poultry business.

loans.name: Lila

texts.es:
Sra. Lila is a member of "Las Rosas" (The Roses) community bank. She lives in the Peruvian region or "departamento" of Ucayali. She's 62 years old and the mother of 4 children, all of whom are independent with families of their own. She's been a widow for 7 years and her earnings are her sole source of income.

With a recently-granted loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.800 (800 Peruvian soles or about US$266), to be repaid in 4 months, Lila will buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, pasta and toilet paper to start her business and, hopefully, better her life.

Lila is grateful to Manuela Ramos because they've allowed her to show that age is no barrier to working and getting ahead while other lenders have slammed the door on her loan requests.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Lila es socia del Banco Comunal “Las ROSAS”, su vivienda esta ubicada en Prolongación Tupac Amaru Mz K Lte 16 del Distrito de Yarinacocha del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 62 años y es madre de 4 hijos los cuales ya tienen familia y son independientes, ella trabaja para poder mantenerse sola ya que enviudo hace 7 años

Con el reciente préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/. 800 (US$ 266.00 aprox.), el cual será pagado en 4 meses, ella comprará 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar ,1 lata de aceite ,un paquete de papel higiénico , 2 bolsas de fideos para poder implementar su negocio y que pueda cumplir con sus expectativas de seguir mejorando .

Lila esta muy agradecida con Manuela Ramos porque le permite demostrar que la edad no es una barrera par trabajar y salir adelante ya que en muchos sitios le cerraron las puertas con un crédito menos Manuela.

loans.use: Buy everyday goods for resale.

loans.name: Ana Rosa Peña

texts.en:
Ana Rosa, 37, is a very active woman and passionate about business.  She has three children (two boys and a girl) that attend a secondary school of the township.  Her husband is a doctor and has a pharmacy.   The couple also has a grocery store which has been run for more than two years.  The store was managed by two of Ana’s relatives.  Four months ago, she decided to assume direction of the business.
There are a lot of changes she wants to make in the grocery store.  First, she wants to remodel where she runs the store. In order to reduce inventory costs, she wants to buy in bulk the goods she offers to the customers.  She will be looking for another provider in the same township instead of getting the products from Santo Domingo, the capital.  She is very determined to make the business grow and radically improve the sales volume.
The entrepreneur is very positive and trusts that she will get the funds she is requesting so that she can achieve her goals for the grocery store and be able to keep on improving her family’s condition.

loans.use: The entrepreneur needs funds to buy goods in bulk in order to supply her grocery store.  She assumed leadership of the store recently and wants to make a lot of changes

loans.name: Victoria Feliciana

texts.es:
Feliciana is happy because everyday she can contribute to her household economy by growing and nurturing her animals. She raises piglets, cows, and bulls. She takes these animals to a cattle fair on her locality and currently the number of animals she owns has grown thanks to the care she gives them. She is originally from Chambara, she was born and raised in a farming family and now she is happily married and has five children. Her children are all that she could live for. She wakes up very early everyday so she can take care of her children and then she goes off to the field so her animals can eat, after a very intense day she goes back home to get the energy to continue with her daily chores. Thanks to this activity she has been able to provide for her family. She has many desires to keep working this way, improve her stables, and give better quality food to her animals so they will fatten. She requests a loan so she can keep giving support to her children’s education. Let’s help Feliciana in her desire to grow excellent professionals and men of good.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Escalante, Kiva volunteer

Feliciana, está feliz porque día a día puede aportar a la economía de su hogar mediante la crianza y engorde a de sus animales, ella cría cerditos pero sobre todo vacas y toros que los lleva a una feria ganadera de su localidad y actualmente el número de sus animalitos se ha incrementado por la constancia y la dedicación en el cuidado que les otorga.Ella es natural de Chambara, nació y creció en una familia netamente ganadera y hoy felizmente casada y con 5 hijos, que mueven todo su existir, trabaja diariamente levantándose muy temprano para poder atender a sus hijos y luego irse al campo para que sus animales obtengan de la naturaleza sus propios alimentos, después de un día intenso regresa en las tardes a su casa para reponer sus fuerzas y continuar diariamente con sus labores.Gracias a esta actividad que realiza ha podido apoyar a su familia. Tiene muchos anhelos de seguir trabajando de esta manera pero para mejorar sus establos y darles mejor calidad de alimentos para su engorde, solicita un préstamo, esto le favorecerá para poder seguir dando a sus hijos el sustento para su educación.Apoyemos a Feliciana en sus grandes deseos de ver a sus hijos convertidos en excelentes profesionales y hombres de bien.

loans.use: Compra de alimento y herramientas para renovar las instalaciones del establo.

loans.name: Mayra

texts.es:
Sra. Mayra has belonged to the "Las Triunfadoras" (Women Triumphant) community bank for 5 years. She lives in the Peruvian region or "departamento" of Ucayali. She's 42 years old and the mother of 3 children. Her husband has a welding and lathe business in their house. Mayra, in turn, has a food sales and delivery business; her children deliver the food to her customers. She also helps her husband run the welding business.

With a recently-granted loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.2,500 (2,500 Peruvian soles or about US$833), to be repaid in 4 months, Mayra will buy an industrial cooker and equipment for welding aluminum.

Mayra is pleased that she can help her family have a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Mayra pertenece desde hace 5 años al Banco Comunal “Las Triunfadoras”, su vivienda esta ubicada en la Av. Bellavista 374 D. Distrito de Callería D. Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 42 años y es madre de 3 hijos, su esposo trabaja en un taller de soldadura y torno en su casa. En la actualidad se dedica a la venta de comida, en forma de reparto a domicilio, cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos para la repartición a sus clientes, y en forma conjunta con su esposo administra el negocio de soldadura.

Con el reciente préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/.2,500 (US$ 833.00 aprox.), que lo pagará en 4 meses, comprará una cocina industrial y una máquina de soldar para aluminio.

Mayra se siente contenta de poder apoyar a su familia para así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.

loans.use: Buy industrial cooker for a food business and welding equipment for a welding business.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sra. Sara belongs to the "Las Azucenas" (The Lillies) community bank in the Peruvian region or "departamento" of Ucayali. She's 41 years old and the mother of 3 children. Her husband is an electrician but his earnings weren't covering the family's expenses so Sara decided to start a clothes-selling business, bartering goods in exchange for products like animals, grain and platanos.

With a recently-granted loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.1,500 (1,500 Peruvian soles or about US$500), to be repaid in 4 months, Sara will buy a dozen blouses for S/.150, a dozen pairs of pants for S/.400, two dozen towels for S/.300, a dozen mosquito nets and two dozen pairs of sandals.

Sara is pleased that the hard work she does is for the good of her family even though she often has to leave them to keep her business going.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Sara pertenece al Banco Comunal “Las Azucenas”, su vivienda está ubicada en el A.H. Unión de Damnificados MZ.182 LT.8 del Distrito de Yarinacocha del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 41 años y es madre de 3 hijos. Su esposo es Técnico Electricista y lo poco que ingresaba al hogar no alcanzaba para los gastos familiares, por lo que ella decidió viajar y dedicarse a la venta de ropa por zonas aledañas el río, haciendo trueque con sus productos (cambio de producto por animales, granos y plátano).

Con el reciente préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/. 1,500.00 (US$ 500.00 aprox.), el cual será pagado en 4 meses, comprará una docena de blusas a S/. 150 soles, una docena de pantalones a S/.400.00 , dos docenas de toallas a S/. 300.00, una docena de mosquiteros y dos docenas de sandalias.

Sara se siente contenta y satisfecha porque sabe que el esfuerzo que hace es por el bienestar de la familia, aunque tenga que dejarlos por varios días, mientras el esposo se hace cargo del hogar

loans.use: Buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: María Gertrudis

texts.en:
María Gertrudis P. is a 47-year-old woman who is striving in order to make a living and fend for her five children.  She runs a grocery store that she opened five years ago with her husband. 
She gets the merchandise in the township, since there are a lot of fields there and she can obtain the goods fresh.  She sells all kinds of vegetables, beans, rice, flour and other foodstuffs.
The entrepreneur would like to augment the operations volume of her sales activity.  She thinks that she would attend to more customers if she could buy some products in bulk.  Given this loan, María Gertrudis will see her business dream fulfilled and will earn as much as necessary to keep on running the business and looking after her children.

loans.use: To purchase larger amounts of goods to supply her grocery store in order to increase the store's operations volume.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sra. Sonia belongs to the "Madres Coraje" (Mothers of Courage) community bank in the Peruvian region or "departamento" of Ucayali. She's 41 years old, married and the mother of two children. She started a bakery business 7 years ago that she's built with her husband's help. She now makes 1 batch of bread a day for 20 regular customers ("bodegas" or neighborhood shops). She's also acquired a "motokar" (a three-wheeled motorized rickshaw-like vehicle) that she uses to deliver orders to her customers.

With a recently-granted loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.1,200 (1,200 Peruvian soles or about US$400), to be repaid in 4 months, Sonia will be able to buy flour, sugar, butter and yeast.

Sonia is currently taking a course offered by the Manuela Ramos Movement to help businesses like hers learn more about the making of bread and bakery products so that she can improve the quality of her products.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Sonia, pertenece al Banco Comunal “Madres Coraje” del Distrito de Yarinacocha del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 41 años, está casada y es madre de dos hijos. Se inició hace 7 años en el negocio de la panadería y desde entonces cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo. Actualmente prepara 1 saco de pan diario y cuenta con 20 clientes fijos (bodegas). Además de haber adquirido un motokar (movilidad) para la distribución de su producto a los clientes.

Con el préstamo recientemente recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/.1,200.00 ($400 aprox.) que será cancelado en 4 meses, podrá comprar 4 sacos de harina, 2 sacos de azúcar, 5 sacos de manteca y 5 Kg. de levadura.

Sonia, se siente muy contenta ya que actualmente esta ampliando sus conocimientos acerca de la elaboración de panes y panetones en el curso de panaderos que viene realizando el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, esto le permitirá ser más competente y mejorar la calidad de sus productos.

loans.use: Buy supplies for bakery business.

loans.name: Jelssi

texts.es:
Jelssi is a young mother of two, one is two and the other one is about to be born. She wishes the best for her children and even though she is at the end of her pregnancy she is still feeding her cows and bulls, procuring the growth of her animals both big and small. Three years ago she got together with her spouse and formed a family full of love. She fattens her animals and sells them afterwards at a cattle fair, with the profits she saves and she has the dream of buying their own home. Currently she lives with her in-laws. Her husband also is a farmer; although they have been through some hardships they will keep doing this activity because they still have some good economic times when they get large sums of money. She wishes to buy a bull to fatten it and sell it, this is why she wants the loan for. Let’s help this young mother to form a solid with her effort.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Escalante, Kiva volunteer

Jelssi, es una joven madre de 2 hijos uno de dos años y otro que está a punto de nacer, su condición la llena de muchas satisfacciones y quiere darles lo mejor, a pesar de su estado de embarazo terminal ella sigue trabajando en la alimentación para el engorde de sus vacas y toros, procurándoles sustento también a sus animalitos pequeños.Hace 3 años decidió unirse a su pareja y formar una familia llena de afecto y hasta ahora siguen trabajando y lo seguirán haciendo porque fruto del amor que se tienen mantiene a sus pequeños en el seno de su hogar.Ella engorda a sus animales y luego los vende en una feria ganadera, con las ganancias que obtiene puede ahorrar y tiene el anhelo de tener una casa propia ya que ahora vive en casa de sus suegros, por otra parte su esposo también se dedica a las labores agrícolas y a pesar de que en algunas ocasiones, Jelssi, perdió en la venta de animales seguirá dedicándose a esta actividad porque de todas maneras existen buenos tiempos en los que obtiene considerables sumas de dinero.Desea comprar un toro más para engordarlo y luego venderlo y por ello solicita un préstamo.Apoyemos a esta joven madre que quiere formar un hogar sólido con su esfuerzo.

loans.use: Compra de un pequeño torito.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando is a young man that works on agricultural activities and has many plans. He graduated from University 3 years ago, where he studied forestry engineering and this is why 2 years ago he decided to work on agribusiness in his parents’ fields, working very hard and applying what he learned while in school, he is also writing his thesis and preparing to defend it. His goal is to get his title so he can help his community with the knowledge he gained and also help his elderly parents in retribution for everything they did for him. It is because of Fernando’s heart full of gratituD. that has enabled him to finish his degree and now working with the harvests. He plants potatoes, maize, barley and broad beans. In this time of the year Fernando needs to buy seeds, fertilizer, and fuel for his tractor. With his effort, dedication, and your important contribution his land will produce more and better products.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Escalante, Kiva volunteer

Fernando, es un joven que se dedica D. lleno a las actividades agrícolas y tiene grandes deseos D. superación. Es egresado D. L. universidad hace 3 años, ha estudiado L. carrera D. ingeniería forestal y es por ello que deciD. hace 2 años dedicarse a las actividades agrícolas en los campos D. cultivo D. sus padres dándose D. lleno y aplicando lo que aprendió en las aulas universitarias; este tiempo sirve a Fernando para poder tramitar su tesis y poder sustentarL..Su anhelo es poder titularse para apoyar a su comunidad con los conocimientos adquiridos y el otro noble deseo que tiene es el D. poder sostener a sus padres ya ancianos en retribución a todo lo que hicieron por él.Ese corazón lleno D. gratitud a permitido en L. vida D. Fernando alcanzar logros tales como terminar su carrera y ahora el D. mejorar L. cosecha. Siembra papa, maíz, cebada y habas; y en esta época D. siembra necesita adquirir semillas, abonos y combustible para el tractor a fin D. labrar L. tierra.Con su esfuerzo, dedicación y vuestra importante contribución logrará que sus tierras produzcan más y mejores productos.

loans.use: Compra de semillas, abono y combustible.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene is a hardworking woman; during the years she has overcome many economic scarce circumstances, although this was never something that let her down. Since 13 years ago she has been working really hard to ensure the well being of the people in her household, they all make a real integrated and supportive team. Currently she is working to overcome the challenges that she has pit on to herself: being able to grow economically and cover the needs of her children, who everyday have more plans to continue their studies. Her youngest son is newborn, so she currently just feeds the animals in her house and takes care of her children in the company of her husband, who takes care of taking them to the field. Now, Marlene is thinking about continuing to take care of her animals and she will invest it in the forage of her cattle, and she needs your help to achieve her plans.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Escalante, Kiva volunteer

Marlene, es una mujer trabajadora, a lo largo de los años ella enfrentó muchas circunstancias de escasez económica y esto no fue motivo para que se dejara derrotar y desde hace 13 años que ha trabajado arduamente para procurarles bienestar a los miembros de su hogar en el que todos conforman un equipo bien engranado y solidario.Actualmente trabaja para seguir adelante con los retos que ella misma se ha propuesto, el de poder crecer económicamente y poder cubrir aún más las necesidades de sus hijos que cada día tienen nuevos planes de estudio, el último de sus hijos es apenas un recién nacido por lo que ahora sólo se dedica a alimentar a sus animales en su casa y sus hijos en compañía de su esposo se encargan de llevarlos al campo.Ahora Marlene piensa seguir dedicándose a la venta de los animales y para ello invertirá en la compra de forraje y necesita la ayuda de vosotros para llevar a cabo sus planes.

loans.use: Compra de forraje para alimentar a sus animalitos.

loans.name: Estrella Adelaida

texts.es:
EstrelL. is a very hardworking woman and knows that each day she has to give her best effort and all her courage. She works raising animals and feeding them with the goal of later selling them. This activity created in her feelings of satisfaction because it allows her to proviD. for a considerable amount of the household income. She began making a living in this way when she invested money from a loan over ten years ago to get started and with the dedication that she puts forth, she has seen her little stable grow. The care that she takes to feed the animals and supply them with occasional medical visits from the veterinarian has increased their population and so now she guides them into the field each day for feeding. She makes sure not to neglect her role as a mother, because she’s also very dedicated to lovingly raising her five children, who also help out in caring for the animals during their free time. She wants to improve her stable stalls and produce milk in a quantity sufficient for selling it commercially. It is for this reason that she’s requesting a loan to buy fodder for her many animals. Please support this woman who is determined to change the course of her life with dedication and hard work.

Translated from Spanish by Johnny and Jay of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteers

EstrelL., es una mujer muy esforzada y sabe que a cada día le tiene que otorgar esfuerzo y coraje, trabaja criando sus animales y alimentándolos para después D. un tiempo venderlos. Esta actividad ha generado en elL. sentimientos D. satisfacción porque le permite aportar sumas considerables a L. economía D. su hogar; comenzó a dedicarse a este rubro cuando invirtió el dinero D. un préstamo hace ya más D. 10 años a esta actividad y con L. dedicación que pone ha visto crecer su pequeño establo.Los cuidados que elL. tiene para alimentarlos y también las revisiones periódicas con un médico veterinario ha aumentado L. población D. sus animales y ahora cada día los lleva al campo sin descuidar el rol D. madre que tiene ya que también se dedica con mucho amor al cuidado D. sus 5 hijos que también en sus tiempos D. recreación apoyan con el cuidado D. sus animales.Quiere mejorar las instalaciones D. su establo y producir leche en cantidad para comercializarL. es por ello que solicita un préstamo para comprar forraje para sus animales.Apoya a una mujer decidida a cambiar el curso D. su historia con dedicación y esfuerzo.

loans.use: Stocking her little stable and buying food for her dear animals.

loans.name: Maribel Talia

texts.es:
Maribel is a very dedicated hard-working woman. She doesn't wait for opportunities to come to her life for her to grow. She takes the initiative and creates these opportunities herself. This is why three years ago she decided to open an internet cabin at her house. She decided to open it because she saw the need for it at her neighborhood and also because it allowed her to provide for her children.

After she separated from her husband a year ago she was in even more need to work constantly and she has been able to make it - she meets all her children's needs and provides sustenance and education for them. When there are problems, she doesn't let them take her down. She remembers all the love she has for her children in spite of the lack of support from her husband.

She tends to her small business daily controlling the computer's rent time. This allows her to take care of her last child. Her two older sons now study and also help out with the business since they have learned how important it is to work together with the family. This is why she has decided to improve the services by upgrading the computers and enhancing the cabin for clients to enjoy their stay more. Lets help Maribel continue with her purpose for the benefit of her dear children.

Translated from Spanish by Yael Schwartzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Maribel, es una mujer decidida a trabajar y no espera que exista las oportunidades en su vida para crecer, ella misma toma la iniciativa y se las crea, es así que hace tres años decidió abrir en su casa una cabina de internet cuando vió la necesidad que existía en su localidad y también porque le permite sostener a sus tres hijos.Tras la separación de su esposo hace un año tuvo aún más la necesidad de trabajar constantemente y lo ha logrado porque sostiene sola la educación y todas las necesidades de sus hijos. No se deja abatir por los problemas y recuerda siempre el inmenso amor que tiene por sus hijos, a pesar de no recibir el apoyo de su esposo. Día s día se dedica a atender su pequeño negocio controlando los tiempos de alquiler de las máquinas, esto le permite atender a su último retoño, sus dos hijos mayores estudian y también la apoyan porque aprendieron que es bueno trabajar todos en familia. Por eso ahora piensa mejorar los servicios que ofrece repotenciando las máquinas que tiene y adecuando el local para una mejor estadía.Ayudemos a Maribel continuar con su propósito para bienestar de sus queridos hijos.

loans.use: Upgrade computers and enhance the internet cabin

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Invest in more products

loans.name: Olimpio

texts.es:
Don Olimpio is a person that works hard and is always striving to give the best of himself. His hard work has helped him to overcome times of poverty and shortages and he has always struggled to give the best life possible to his family. In the past he worked as a traveling salesman when he lived in Lima. Twenty-seven years ago he began to build his own house and he decided to set up a small store in his house. The store gives great service to his customers that assures that they keep returning. Now that his children are grown and starting their own families, Don Olimpio is satisfied to have raised them well and now he is alone with his faithful companion who has always helped him with his business. Now he wants to stock his store with a greater variety of products. He wants to feel useful and productive so that he can continue working and enjoy good health. To make that possible, he needs this loan. The loan support you give to Don Olimpio will mean a lot to him.

Translated from Spanish by Gabe of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Don Olimpio, es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre se esfuerza por dar lo mejor de sí. Sus ganas de trabajar lo han llevado a superar momentos de escasez y es por ello que siempre ha luchado por dar lo mejor a su familia, tiempo atrás se dedicaba al comercio ambulatorio cuando radicaba en Lima y hace 27 años cuando recién empezó a construir su casa propia decidió instalar una pequeña bodega que hasta hoy es una de las mejores y brinda un trato agradable que asegura el regreso de sus clientes.Ahora que sus dos hijos fueron formando ya sus propios hogares como parte de sus vidas, Don Olimpio, se siente satisfecho de haberlos instruido durante largos años y sólo se queda con su fiel compañera de toda la vida que está con él en la atención de su bodega.Ahora desea surtir con mayor mercadería su tienda, el sentirse útil y con fuerzas para seguir trabajando y gozar de buena salud es por ello que solicita un préstamo.Tu aporte para el préstamo a Don Olimpio será muy significativo.

loans.use: Capital for stocking his little sales center

loans.name: Julia Gladys

texts.es:
Julia is a very hardworking and persevering woman. These virtues have brought her continual success over the years like the construction and improvement of her home so that she may provide a better place for her four children to live together with her. In the years past she has always seen a way to obtain considerable economic income and support her husband who, though he always works, often does not receive enough money to cover the expenses of their household. She obtained work through a team formed by a club of mothers who together began raising guinea pigs and installing guinea pig habitats in various homes. Julia is already working independently thanks to her dedication to daily improvement. She has also increased her population of guinea pigs. This fills her with satisfaction and moves her towards reaching her future goal of becoming the best exporter of guinea pigs in her country. Additionally, she opened a little shop close to her home a month ago. All these efforts are done to secure a better future for her kids, who have motivated her to progress in life and they are the reason she’s working for a secure economic situation. To fulfill her longings Julia requests a loan to invest in better habitats for her guinea pigs and buy alfalfa for feeding them. Let’s support Julia in her work; she’s a mother who always longs for the best for her children.

Translated from Spanish by Edith and Jay of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteers

Julia, es una mujer muy trabajadora y empeñosa, estas virtudes la han llevado a lo largo de los años a conseguir logros en su vida como el de construir y mejorar las instalaciones de su casa, para poder darles un lugar mejor en donde vivir junto a sus 4 retoños. En años anteriores siempre ha visto la manera de obtener considerables ingresos económicos y apoyar a su esposo que siempre trabaja y muchas veces el dinero que percibe es insuficiente para cubrir los gastos que genera su hogar.Ella procuró realizar un trabajo en equipo al asociarse a un club de madres que la animaron y en conjunto comenzaron un ciclo de capacitación para instalar en varias casas sus criaderos de cuyes, en la actualidad Julia ya es independiente y gracias a su dedicación cada día mejora; ya que aumentó la población de cuyes que poseía.Esto la llena de satisfacción y la lleva a trazarse una meta a futuro para convertirse en la mejora exportadora de cuyes de su país, adicionalmente a esto hace un mes abrió una pequeña tienda cercana a su casa, todos estos esfuerzos lo hace para procurarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos que siempre la motivan a seguir adelante y es por ellos que va por la vía segura de la superación económica. Para poder cumplir sus anhelos Julia solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de mejores ambientes para la comodidad de sus cuyes e invertir en la compra de alfalfa para su alimentación.Apoyemos a Julia en su labor de madre que siempre anhela lo mejor para su familia.

loans.use: Improve the habitats for raising guinea pigs and buy alfalfa to give them better nourishment.

loans.name: Magda Edith

texts.es:
Mrs. Magda T. sells new and used clothing. This is her family's income as she is a single mother and has two children. She is asking for a $650 loan in order to buy new seasonal winter clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

La Sra. Magda T. se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada. Este es el ingreso de su familia ya que es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos. Ella esta solicitando un préstamo de $650.00 dlls. Para la compra de ropa nueva de temporada de invierno.

loans.use: Purchase winter clothing inventory

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Fundación para la Vivienda Progresiva (FVP), a partner of CHF International - Oct 25, 2008)

loans.name: José Carlos

texts.es:
I have been selling natural products for more than one year. Thanks to God and my business I have been able to keep my family moving forward. But I want to invest more in the business without using all my savings, and have more products to sell. I am asking for a loan of $1000 in order to buy natural products to sell.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

Me dedico a la venta de productos naturales este es mi negocio desde hace mas de 1 años. Gracias a dios y a mi negocio e sacada adelante a mi familia. Pero quiero invertir más en el negocio sin descapitalizarme y tener más productos para vender. Solicito un préstamo de $1,000.00 Dlls. Para la compra de productos naturales (mercancía).

loans.use: Purchase inventory - natural products

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Fundación para la Vivienda Progresiva (FVP), a partner of CHF International - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Dulce Maria

texts.es:
Dulce María has had a beauty salon for over a year now. She says, "My business is very important for me because it is the source of income for my family. To be able to keep my business going, I need a certain kind of equipment like hair clippers. This is why I'm requesting a loan of $1,000 for the purchase of beauty equipment.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer.

La Sra. Dulce Maria tiene un estética desde mas de 1 años. Mi negocio es muy importante para mí ya que es la fuente de ingresos de mi familia. Para poder sacar adelante mi negocio me esta haciendo falta cierto tipo de equipo para la estética como maquinas. Por eso solicito un préstamo de $1,000.00 Dlls Para la compra de equipo para la estética.

loans.use: Purchase of equipment

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Fundación para la Vivienda Progresiva (FVP), a partner of CHF International - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Invest in more products such as holiday gifts

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
When he was little, Juan C. would go to a little family grove, to plant and collect oranges. As he grew up, he grew fond of this fruit and learned how to grow them and sell them. In the beginning, Juan only sold oranges in the season of higher production, but after he had built a clientele, he realized that he had to sell all year round. And so it is that he started his permanent business because of the need to support his wife and two children.

However, Juan believes he has to buy more merchandise so he can have more money moving in his business and can make ends meet during the seasons of low production of oranges. This is why he is requesting a loan of US $250 to be paid in 6 months. With this money, Juan will be able to buy more merchandise to have more variety in his business. With your help you can make Juan's family succeed.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva Volunteer

Cuando era pequeño Juan C., se iba a una pequeña huerta familiar, a sembrar y cosechar naranjas, cuando fue creciendo le agarró un cariño a estos frutos, y aprendió cómo cosecharlos y venderlos. En un principio Juan sólo vendía las naranjas en la temporada en que se producía más, pero después de empezar a hacer clientes, se dio cuenta que los tenía que vender durante todo el año, y es así como comenzó el negocio. Que en un inicio fue esporádico y por la necesidad de tener con qué mantener a su esposa y a sus dos hijos inició.

Sin embargo Juan considera que tiene que comprar más mercancía, para poder tener movimiento de dinero en su negocio y así solventarse en temporadas bajas de la naranja. Por lo tanto está solicitando un crédito de US $ 250 para pagarlos en un plazo de 6 meses y con este dinero Juan podrá comprar más mercancía para tener variedad en su negocio. Con tu ayuda lograrás que la familia de Juan pueda salir adelante.

loans.use: Buying merchanidise to have more variety in his business.

payments.comment:
This is a prepayment for the remaining balance of this loan.  The reason for the prepayment is that during the uploading process, there was an error in the loan term entered for this entrepreneur - it was marked as 6 months, and should have been 4 months.  As such, Mr. Castillo has recently paid off this loan in full, and in fact he has  already taken out an additional loan (which you can see here on the Kiva site!!  http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=businesses&action=about&id=40989)
Thanks so much for your support of Mr. Castillo through Kiva!

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Improve her inventory

loans.name: Olga Enriqueta

texts.es:
Olga is a woman and mother who believes that the man should not be the only one contributing money to the household and the children. For this reason she has always looked for ways to receive extra income to be able to help with expenses. Olga says, "Nowadays the economic situation is very hard, one income is not enough." So, on one occasion Olga was offered the opportunity to buy an acquaintance's business of selling milk products, and she decided to take it. With time she realized that the business would grow little by little if she would put enough time into it. And so it was that she kept working hard, until she was able to make it what it is now, a well-known business in her neighborhood.

However, Olga does not want to fall into conformity, and that is why she wants to grow her business a little more, since the business is becoming an important source of income for her family and this motivates her to keep growing for everyone's future. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of US $475 to be paid in 6 months. With this money, Olga will buy merchandise to sell a greater variety of products in her store. With your help you will make Olga's dream come true.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva Volunteer

Olga es una mujer y madre de familia que cree que el hombre no debe ser el único que aporte dinero para la manutención del hogar y los hijos. Por lo tanto ella siempre buscó la manera de sacar algunos ingresos extras para poder ayudar con los gastos. Puesto que dice Olga “En la actualidad la situación está muy difícil, con un solo sueldo no basta”. En una ocasión se le presentó la oportunidad de que una conocida le traspasaba un negocio de venta de lácteos, por lo que decidió aceptarla y con el tiempo vio que el negocio si le dedicaba el tiempo suficiente crecería poco a poco. Y fue así como siguió luchando, hasta lo que es ahora, un local conocido en su colonia.

Sin embargo Olga no quiere caer en el conformismo, y es por eso que desea crecer su negocio un poco más, puesto que el negocio se está haciendo la fuente importante de su familia y eso la motiva a seguir creciendo para el futuro de todos. Por lo tanto está solicitando un crédito de US $475 para pagarlos en un plazo de 6 meses y con ese dinero Olga comprará mercancía para vender más variedad en su tienda. Con tu ayuda lograrás que Olga cumpla su sueño.

loans.use: Buying merchandise to have more variety in her business.
